dataList.name: Santata's Guffaw
dataList.desc:
At 10+ [Charge], gain [AaCeSeBa] next turn.
At 30%- Core HP, gain [AaCeSeBa] every turn.

dataList.name: Lights Out
dataList.desc: Lose all [Charge] when this unit is Staggered.

dataList.name: Scattering Breath
dataList.desc: Lose 1 [Breath] when hit by an Attack Skill

dataList.name: I CAN'T BAG THE GIFTS!!
dataList.desc: Base Power -2 to 'Let's Get Packing' if the Gift Sack Part is broken.
